Kuva mu 1988, agasandugu k'amatora gategerezwa kuba kabonerana kugira ngo, abatora hamwe n’abahagarikiye amatora, barabe ko ata bahasha na rimwe ryasizwemwo imbere y'amatora, kiretse ayo abatora bonyene bashiramwo kandi babiherewe uruhusha.
Umushiranganji wambere w'imfatakibanza Julia Gillard yemeje mu my'iyamamazo yo 2010 ko yemera ko Ostraliya yoba republika inyuma yintwaro y'umwamikazi Elizabeth II.

Mu kwezi guheze, harabaye imyiyerekano ikomeye muri Polonye aho ico gihugu cashize umukono ku masezerano ACTA. Iyo myiyerekano yatumye leta ya Polonye ifata ingingo yo kuba iraretse kwemeza ayo masezerano.
Ingabisho zitangwa na leta ziba ari incamake gusa y'ingene ivya politike vyifashe mu gihugu kimwe.

Mu gihe c'amahitamwo yabaye mu 1976, yarabereye umuhanuzi Carter mu vy'imigenderanire n'ayandi makungu, araheza aba umuhanuzwajambo w'igihugu mu vy'umutekano kuva mu 1977 gushika mu 1981, asubiriye Henry Kissinger.

Ayo masezerano yari ayo kudatera ibitero hagati y’Abasoviyeti na Polonye hamwe n’ayandi masezerano mpuzamakungu bari giraniranye.

Inyuma yo kwemezwa n’imana nshingamateka ku wa 4 Mukakaro, itegeko ryashizweko umukono n’uwurongoye inama nshingamateka John Hancock hamwe n’umunyamabanga Charles Thomson, ryaciye rirungikwa gusohorwa mw'isohorero rya John Dunlap.
Inyuma gato y'isaha 11:00, abari mu myiyerekano barazibiye uruja n'uruza rw'ingendeshwa zija mu buraruko aho i Whitehall.

N'aho biri ukwo, muri Ruheshi 1956, ivyo Krushchev yiyemeje vyarapimwe aho imigumuko muri Pologne, aho abakozi bariko biyamiriza ubukene bw'imfungurwa n'ukugabanuka kw'imishahara, bahindukira bakiyamiririza hamwe Communisme.

Yari igiye kumara imyaka 40 yakwirikiye kandi yari igiye kugwanwa vya nyavyo, n'ingabo z'inserukizi, ku bibuga vy'intambara muri Afirika na Aziya, muri Afuganistani, muri Cuba n'ibindi bibanza vyinshi.
Mukwezi guheze umugwi w'uburongozi wategetse ikurwa rya CEP yahahora muntumbero yitorwa ry'ingingo zizoshikana igihugu kumatora mashasha.
Ibindi bibazo vyizweko bishobora kuba harimwo akazoza ka leta ya Yeruzaremu yo ari ikibanza cerenda kuri ivyo bihugu uko ari vyompi hamwe n'ikibazo c'Ikiyaya ca Yorodani.
Nta bubasha yari ifise bwo kurengera amategeko ajanye n'amakori be n'ibitigiri vy'amahera vyashinzwe mu maleta atandukanye.
Amategeko y’Ubufaransa ajanye n’amatora aravuga neza ingene bigenda.
Inyuma y'indwi yaranzwe n'ugutakaza amajwi mu matora aba umukuru w'igihugu acagatije manda yiwe, Bush yarashikirije abantu umugambi wo kwagura imigenderanire y'urudandaza muri Aziya.

Uwo mukenyuro warakunze kuko watumye abasoda babo n'abanyagihugu bataronka ibintu vya nkenerwa, naho ivyo bihano vyari biteye kubiri n'amategeko mpuzamakungu yemewe na benshi yanditswe biciye ku masezerano mpuzamakungu atari make yari yabaye mu binjana biri vyari biheze.
Imigenderaine y'ivy'ubutunzi yarasubiye gushirwaho hagati y'ivyo bice bibiri vya Moldova n'aho ibiganiro vya politike vyananiwe.
Aherekejwe n’abo bakorana, yijeje ababa muri Texas ko hafashwe ingingo ruhasha zo gucungera amagara y'abanyagihugu.
Ababuranira agateka k'abanyagihugu baneguye akigoro kagizwe ko gusanura bafatiye canecane ku kuntu amasezerano y'ugusanura yahawe abantu bamwebamwe b'indani i Washington.
Kubantu 1400 babajijwe imbere y'amatora ya 2010, abatari bashigikiye ko Ostraliya yoba republika biyongereye ibice 8% guhera muri 2008.

Inyuma yo kubona ivyavuye mu matora, Gingrich yarashimagije cane Santorum, ariko yongera avuga nabi Romney kuko mu myiyamamazo yo muri Iowa nawe yari yamuvuze nabi.
Ni CEP ya Martelly igira gatanu mumyaka ine.

Uwatahukanye umudari w'inzahabu yategekanywa kwoga imetero 100 hamwe nizindi 200 yoga bisanzwe hamwe no mumarushanwa atatu y'inkino za Commonwealth, ariko kubera imyidogo yiwe imero yiwe y'umubiri yarakekeranyweko.
Iruhande yo kuba uwahoze ari uwufise intsinzi yambere y'Isi na Olympic, Saito yari umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe imyimenyerezo ya All Japan Judo Federation igihe yaryamira ukuboko kw'abagabo.

Komite mpuzamakungu iraba ivy'inkino za Olempike ryemeje gushiramwo izo nkino mu nama y'abakuru yabereye i Berlin uno munsi. Urukino rwa rigibi, urwitwa neza na neza «rigibi ya cumi na batanu», hamwe n'urwa golf vyatowe mu gishingo c'izindi zitantu ngo zizoshirwe mu Nkino za Olempike.
Ihiganwa rikuru ry' umwaka riba muri Kigarama ku bibuga vya polo muri Las Cañitas.
Kuva aho yimukiye mu murwa mukuru wa Catalogne, Vidal yari amaze gukinira uwo mugwi inkino 49.
Kugumana inguvu nziza, kunywa amazi neza hamwe no gutahura uburyo butandukanye bwo kugorora imitsi, birafasha abanonotsi kuduza uko babayeho hanyuma bigatuma bakunda kwinonora imitsi.
Uwagatatu ni Hamlin arushwa amanota 20 n’uwambere. Hamlin nawe arusha amanota atanu Bowyer. Kahne ni uwagatanu n’amanota 2 220, Truex nawe ni uwa gatandatu n’amanota 2 207.
Igihe Nadal yakina n'uwo Munyakanada, yamutsinze 7 kuri 2.

Mu gitondo, Jarque yariko arakora imyimenyerezo imbere yo gutangura shampiyona i Coverciano mu Butaliyani. Yagumye muri hoteri y’umurwi imbere y’urukino rutegekanijwe ku munsi wa mungu bahura na Boloniya.
Ubwoba bwo kubura uburyo bwo kwiyunguruza bwongereje ibakweryuko umupira ushobora gukinirwa inyuma y'inzugi zugaye atabarorerezi bo gushigikira umugwi.
Tommy Dreamer yavuzeko "Luna ari umwamikazi wa mbere wo kugwego rwo hejuru. Umufasha wanje wambere. Luna yapfuye mwijoro ry'amezi abiri. Yari umwe rudende mwiza. Umukenyezi akomeye."

Umukinnyi w’umukino wo kunyerera Maciej Krezel ava mugihugu ca Polonye hamwe na Anna Ogarzynska bahejeje ari aba cumi na gatatu muri Super-G. Jong Seork Park wo muri Koreya yepfo nawe yabaye uwa 24 mu bagabo.
Kuri bishasha ku mahiganwa hamwe naho bagurira ama tike y' imipira ya polo, tumbera ishirahamwe Argentina rya Polo.
Inkino zatanguye isaha 10:00 z’agatondo n’ikirere ciza cane kandi uretse akavura gakeyi ko hagati mu gitondo kaciye gahita ningoga, wari umunsi mwiza ku rukino rwa rigibi rw’abakinyi 7.
Arly Velasquez wo muri Mexico yabaye uwa cumi na gatanu mu bagabo muri Super-G nyene, hanyuma Adam Hall wo muri Nouvelle-Zélande aba uwicenda.
Urukino rwanyuma muri uru rukurikirane ruzobera ahitwa Ellis Park i Johannesburg, mu ndwi iza, aho springboks izokina na Australiya.
Igihe hameze neza urashobora kugenda ahantu harehare gusumba uwutambuka, mugabo ni gake cane uzonyaruka nk'abagira ski de fond ata muzigo bahetse, baca mu tuyira tunoze.
Johnson ni uwa kabiri ku manota 2,243. Akaba arushwa amanota indwi n’uwambere.
Ivyo bita canyoning ni ukumanuka epfo mu mwonga wumye canke wuzuyemwo amazi.

Robin Uthappa yatsindiye amanota menshi kuruta abandi bose mu biringo vy'urukino. Yinjije amanota 70 mu gukubita agapira incuro 41 gusa. Yinjije amanota ane-ane incuro 11, n'amanota atandatu-atandatu incuro 2.
Inkino zo mu rushana rukanye cane zikundwa cane mu mihingo yo mu buraruko, Abataliyano bakaba baja mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu na Olempike.
Maroochydore yari yahejeje imbere y´abandi bose, amanota atandatu imbere ya Noosa yaje ubwa kabiri.
Michael Schumacher yahejeje ihiganwa ryiwe inyuma gatoya ya Alonso, kubera ko morotiseri z'umuduga wiwe zari zononywe n'imisukano yagiye iraba muri iryo higanwa.
Gufungura neza kwonyene ntigushobora kuzana ingaruka nziza, ariko birashobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye kubanonotsi bakiri bato.
Ntiyashoboye gufata imiti ikenewe kugira arengere ububabare bwiwe kuberako yaribujijwe mu nkino.
Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko igitsina gore aribo bakunda kugwara iyi ngwara incuro zibiri kuruta igitsina gabo.
Inzoga zikaze zitemewe n'amategeko hari igihe usanga zirimwo imicafu itandukanye iteye akaga, nka méthanol, iyishobora gutera uruhumyi canke urupfu naho iba ari nkeyi.
Gusa ingaruka ziterwa no kwumva wihebuye, atari izakabonge canke ubwoba, zishingiye ku nyigisho zisanzwe zijanye nivyo kugorora umubiri ziba buri ndwi.
Kuba abantu benshi batunze imiduga bigira kandi ingaruka nini ku masanganya yo mu mabarabara, bigatuma hatorwa ubuhinga bushasha mu gisata c’amagara y’abantu bwo kuvura imibiri yononekaye.

Abashakashatsi nyamukuru bavuga ko ako gakoresho gashobora gufasha gutora ningoga kanseri, igituntu, SIDA na malariya ku barwayi bo mu bihugu vy'amikoro make, aho ushobora gusanga ibitigiri vy'abahitanwa n'indwara nka kanseri y'ibere biruta incuro zibiri abo mu bihugu bitunze.

Umuhinga Ehud Ur, umwigisha w'ivy'ubuganga kuri kaminuza ya Dalhousie i Halifax muri Novelle-Écosse akaba ari na we ahagarikiye igisata c'ivy'ubuvuzi n'ivya siyansi mw'Ishirahamwe yitaho ivy'indwara y'igisukari muri Kanada, yagabishije yuko ubushakashatsi bukiri mu ntango.

Abo bana bameze nk'abama mu bibazo vyinshi, kuko "baja mu bintu birimwo ingorane, bararwana, kandi ntibatinye ababakurira" kugira bakabure ubwonko bwabo, kuko ubwonko bwabo budashobora gukaburwa n'uburyo busanzwe.
Abantu barashobora kwandura biciye mu guhema amazi arimwo uburozi bwazanye n’umuyaga canke imikuba.
Abantu bamwe bamwe barizera ko kuronka indoto ukanura ziterwa n'uko wabiteguye bishobora kenshi kukuruhisha cane.
Urukino rugeza aho, Potro yaravuwe ku rutugu mugabo abasha gusubira mu rukino.
Kandi uretse n'ivyo, kunanirwa gukwiza ivyo bifise ingaruka mbi zikomeye: gukurana akabonge, gufungura nabi, kandi mu maherezo n'urupfu.

Abarongoye igisagara ca Amsterdam hamwe n'inzu ndangakaranga yitwa Anne Frank, bavuga ko iki giti camaze kwandura ingwara kandi ko ivyo ari bibi ku magara y’abantu, kuko babona ko umwanya n’umwanya gishobora kugwa.
Ibitaro vyarakurikije ingingo zijanye n’ibiza harimwo gushira umurwayi ukwa wenyene kugira ngo ntashobore kwanduza abandi.

Ikigo ca Hayiti kijejwe ubutungane na demokarasi cisunze ubushakashatsi bwigenga buvuga ko batayo y’abasirikare b’Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU bajejwe kubungabunga amahoro bava muri Nepale ari bo bazanye iyo ndwara muri Hayiti batabizi.
Indwara zandukira ubwazo canke ibikoko biteye akaga bishobora gukoresha inguvu bigakomeretsa umuntu canke bikamwica, mu bisanzwe ntibija muri uwo mugwi.

Abana bafise ingorane ya ADD bafise ibibazo vyo kugumiza umutima ku bintu nk'ibikorwa vy'ishure, ariko bashobora kugumiza umutima ku bintu baryohererwa gukora nko gukina inkino canke kuraba desanime canke kwandika amajambo ata dukwabu.
Mu gihe c´umwaka umwe, uwugwaye umwe yoshobora kwanduza abandi 10 gushika kw´15 bamwegereye.
Aho ingwano yahagarara inyuma y'aho abakoremetse bajanwe ku bitaro, hafi 40 mu bandi bafungwa basigaye bagumye ku mbuga kandi banka gusubira mu dusho twabo.
Abaganga batanguye guhabwa akazi n'Umwami w'abami Augustus maze banashiraho umugwi wambere w'Abaganga b'Abaromani bo kuvura abantu inyuma y'intambara.
Ariko, umushoferi yakomeretse cane kumutwe.
Yongeyeko ati: "Ubu turafise imbeba y'amezi 4 zitakirwaye indwara y'igisukari."
Ishano rirashobora kudashoka ryibonekeza. Ibimenyestso, nko kudahwa, birakunda kuboneka kenshi ku buryo ko umuntu atotera aronderera mw’ishano.
Kubera iyo mvo, abaririmvyi baranywa urumogi bariko bararirimba, kandi ibiteramo birahimiriza abavyitavye kubikora.
Umugwi wa Aerosmith wahagaritse ibiteramo vyabo vyari bisigaye mu rugendo rwabo.
Ushaka rero kwibera hafi y'aho ibirori bibera, utegerezwa kuhashika kare ukaba urarondera ikibanza co gucumbikamwo hafi y'umuziki.
Mu myaka n'iyindi, hari ingero nyinshi zitandukanye za filime zagiye zirakoreshwa. Iza mm 35 (negatife za mm 36 kuri 24) ni zo zimenyerewe cane.
Naho iki ari igikorwa kimenyerwe cane, kirabujijwe na Disney: amatike ntashobora guhanahanwa.
Agace kose k’ikiganiro kashimikira ku mutwe w’ijambo mu gitabo kanaka maze kagaca irya n'ino uwo mutwe biciye mu nkuru nyinshi.
Mu bibanza bitandukanye vy'aho i Roma, harashizwe imboneshakure zifasha abantu kurorera ivyo birori.
Sophocle na Aristophane baracari abanditsi b'ibikino bemerwa cane kandi ibikino banditse biri mu gitigiri c'ivyandikano vyemerwa kuruta ibindi vyose kw'isi.
Ikiganiro cose caratanga ivyerekeye ibitabo abana borondera igihe bagiye mu bibanza basomeramwo ibitabo.
Kugira inota rivuge cane ku kinanda, ukoresha igisaho caco n'inguvu canke unyarutsa.
Murashobora kubona ama piramide mu mwijima kandi murashobora no kuyabona mugacerere imbere yuko igiteramo gitangura.
Umuntu yagiye kwidagadura arshobora guhiga, kuroba, gufata amafoto y’inyoni, kuga ahari ibikoko no kwiga kubijanye n’ibinyabuzima.
I Sphinx ikoreshwa nk' igitambara hamwe n'idondora ry'inkuru ndende.
Usanga kenshi hari imfungurwa, ibinyobwa n'ibikino bidasanzwe kugira abahagendera babandanye kuryoherwa, bahagume.

Hamaze kwerekanwa ibiganiro mucongereza no mukiyapani, ibihugu vyishize hamwe kwisi vyatanguje iyindi migambi muki espanyole, igitaliano n'igikoreya, kumboneshakure, k'ubuhinga ngurukana bumenyi hamwe no kubikoresho ngendanwa.
Imbere y'igikino “Simpsons”, Simon yari yarakoreye kubindi bikino vyinshi ugutandukanye.
Ivyo bizofasha abakinyi gukina no guhindura ikibanza c'amashusho yo mu dukino twa videwo uko bagomba, mu kuza barajana iyo terekomande iyo bashaka mu kirere.
Nimiburiburi abantu 100 bari baje mumusi mukuru, mu ntumbero y'uguhimbaza isabukuru yambere y'abakundana bagize ubugeni bwabo mumwaka uheze.

Hari indirimbo zibiri zo muri iyo sinema zahiganishijwe mu ndirimbo nshasha zaruse izindi: iyitwa Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars. Uruganda rw'amasinema rwitwa Lionsgate rwaraswe incuro 26, rurusha izindi nganda zose.
Krute ifise intimbatimba y’ibilometero 70 kuruhande rwegereye n’ibilometero 100 ku ruhande rwa kure.
Epfo cane mu bumanuko hari Amasumo ya Niagara, mu buraruko na ho hakaba ubwiza kama butaramenywa cane bw'i Muskoka no hirya yaho.
Ellsworth Land ni akarere ko m' ubumanuko bwa Peninsula, kagaburwa n' ikiyaga ca Bellingshausen.
South Pole Traverse (canke Highway) ni akayira k' ibiro metero 1600 kuva Kugituro McMurdo Kukiyaga ca Ross muri Pole.
Amaja hejuru y' uburaruko bwa Machu Picchu hari uwo musozi ugoye, kenshi ugwa kumafoto y' ivyasambutse.
Enceladus nico gikoresho kiyagayaga muri sisiteme y'izuba, irungika hafi ibice 90 kw'ijana vy'umuco w'izuba ugikubita.
Nta kindi ubona atari ijuru rikeye, ryiza riri hejuru n'imisozi myinshi ihakikuje. Uri muri iryo senga, ibintu vyo muri iyi si ubona canke wumva ni bike cane.
Nayo Ubuyapani, igihugu cabwo cari kigizwe n'izinga cokimwe n'Ubwongereza.
Mu gihe caco, igihuhusi “tropical Gonu”, citiriwe umufuko w’amababi y’ibigazi mu rurimi rwo muri Malidiya, carashikanye umuyaga wiruka ku birometero 240 kw’isaha.

Akarere ka Tirikiya, ushizemwo n'ibiyaga, kangana n'ibilometero kwadarato 783.562 (mayiri kwadarato 300.948), ibilometero kwadarato 755.688 (mayiri kwadarato 291.773) muri vyo bikaba biri mu bumanuko bushira ubumanuko bwa Aziya, ibilometero kwadarato 23.764 (mayiri kwadarato 9.174) na vyo bikaba i Buraya.
Amazinga Shetland yo m' ubumanuko, yavumbuwe mu 1819, yiyitirirwa n'ibihugu vyinshi kandi afise ibirindiro vyinshi, harimwo cuminabitandatu bikora muri 2020.
Apia ni wo mugwa mukuru wa Samoa. Ico gisagara kiri kw'izinga rya Upolu, kikaba kibamwo abantu bari munsi gato ya 40.000.
Nkuko igihuhusi kiri kure kugira gishikire isi, biragoye gusuzuma inkurikizi zitezwe zaco kuri reta zunze ubumwe canke Karayibe.
Ironze kugice c’ama mariya hanyuma ikaguka munsi y'imisozi miremire.
Amashamba si ama mangrove gusa mugabo — agizwe na bimwe mubisigarira vyanyuma vy'ishamba rikomeye ryahoze ripfhuka ikiyaya ca Gangetic.

Ikarata mpuzamakungu ya nyamugigima yasohowe n'Urwego rwo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rujejwe ubushakashatsi bw'ivy'umubumbe w'isi, yerekanye ko ata nyamugigima zari zihari muri Isilande indwi imwe imbere yaho.
Iryo senga riri kw'isonga ry'umwe mu misozi yo mu buraruko bwa Maka, rikaba riri ahantu hiherereye cane, hadashikwa.
